name: opendyslexic-for-chrome
description: Format pages using the OpenDyslexic font and low contrast help.
author: Robert James Gabriel

scripts.build: npm run clean &&  npm run chrome
scripts.translate:1: node tools/translate/index.js {{Google Translate code here}} app/_locales/ en  ar,bg,bn,ca,et
scripts.translate:2: node tools/translate/index.js {{Google Translate code here}} app/_locales/ en  fa,fil,fr,ko,lv,ml,mr
scripts.translate:3: node tools/translate/index.js {{Google Translate code here}} app/_locales/ en  ms,sv,te,th,tr,uk,vi,cs,de
scripts.translate:4: node tools/translate/index.js {{Google Translate code here}} app/_locales/ en  el,es,gu,hr,hu,id,nl,no,sl,sr
scripts.translate:5: node tools/translate/index.js {{Google Translate code here}} app/_locales/ en  it,ja,kn,pt,pt-PT,zh,ru,hi,fi,nb
scripts.translate:6: node tools/translate/index.js {{Google Translate code here}} app/_locales/ en  da,pl,ga,he,ro,sk,lt,af,sw,zu,cy
scripts.translate:7: node tools/translate/index.js {{Google Translate code here}} app/_locales/ en  ka,mk,sq,hy,bs
scripts.translate:all: npm run translate:1 && npm run translate:2 && npm run translate:3 && npm run translate:4 && npm run translate:5 && npm run translate:6 && npm run translate:7
